import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const JobEligibilityResult=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const stored=localStorage.getItem('ats-result');if(!stored)return navigate('/upload');try{const parsed=JSON.parse(stored);setData(parsed);}catch(err){console.error('Invalid JSON in ats-result');navigate('/upload');}},[]);if(!data)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-10 text-center text-white",children:"Loading..."});const skills=data.skills.map(skill=>skill.toLowerCase());const has=skill=>skills.includes(skill);const hasAll=function(){for(var _len=arguments.length,arr=new Array(_len),_key=0;_key<_len;_key++){arr[_key]=arguments[_key];}return arr.every(s=>has(s));};const hasSome=function(){for(var _len2=arguments.length,arr=new Array(_len2),_key2=0;_key2<_len2;_key2++){arr[_key2]=arguments[_key2];}return arr.some(s=>has(s));};const suggestedRoles=[];// üíª Full Stack Developer
if(hasAll('html','css','javascript')&&hasSome('flask','mongodb','python')){suggestedRoles.push('Full Stack Developer');}// üéØ Frontend Developer
if(hasAll('html','css','javascript')){suggestedRoles.push('Frontend Developer');}// üß† Backend Developer
if(hasSome('python','flask')&&has('mongodb')){suggestedRoles.push('Backend Developer');}// üé® UI/UX Designer
if(hasSome('figma','wireframing','ux','ui','visual design')){suggestedRoles.push('UI/UX Designer');}// üì£ Digital Marketing Executive
if(hasSome('digital marketing','social media','brand development','project management')){suggestedRoles.push('Digital Marketing Executive');}// üê£ If no strong matches
if(suggestedRoles.length===0){suggestedRoles.push('Intern / Entry-level Trainee');}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-600 to-blue-400 text-white p-10",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-3xl mx-auto bg-white text-gray-800 p-8 rounded shadow-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-6 text-center text-blue-700",children:"\uD83D\uDCBC Job Eligibility Result"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Name:"})," ",data.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"ATS Score:"})," ",data.ats_score,"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Skills Detected:"})," ",data.skills.join(', ')||'None']})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"my-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-2 text-blue-700",children:"\u2705 Suggested Job Roles:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-disc list-inside space-y-1 text-blue-800 font-medium",children:suggestedRoles.map((role,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:role},idx))})]})});};export default JobEligibilityResult;
